director.name: 克里斯 拉维斯 Chris Lavis
马克西 恩泽尔波基斯 Maciek Szczerbowski

this_title: La jeune fille qui pleurait des perles
introduction: A fairytale for all about a girl overwhelmed by grief, a boy who loves her, and how greed leads the purest of hearts to commit the vilest of actions.A timeless and universal story, both strange and familiar, from meticulously crafted puppets and miniature sets. The film uses a hybrid technique of frame-by-frame animation, live-action and CGI to achieve a depth of emotion and expressiveness unseen in a puppet-based medium.
chinese_title: La jeune fille qui pleurait des perles
